name: Band Of The Damned (tyedye105)
description:
!!!SOUND WARNING!!! The game over screen audio is excessively louder than the normal background music. It will be patched out in a later build. Band of the Damned

Set in the backdrop of the city New Orleans, the band rises to march, one more time! Though if they have their way the party will never stop! To the beat of the snare, and bumpin' base lines of a sousaphone they march adding more members to the band as they run into them! Though they gotta watch out for the undertakers who rather they stay in their graves!

Controls

Movement:

Left Arrow key: Rotates the Front of the band to the left

Right Arrow key: Rotates the Front of the band to the right

Use the mouse to click on the retry button!(When it pops up)

Gameplay:

If you have played the iconic game Snake, then it plays just like that! Using the arrow keys guide the band over people to "recruit" them into the band. Currently there is no real "win" condition or "lose" condintion.  To end it, crash the band into itself or run into the one, red, undertaker on the screen.

Made for July 2019's Summer Slow Jam

Code by Jake Conlee

Music and sfx by:Maya Brown

Art, and additional code by:Marty Kovach

Gameplay based of the Code Monkey Youtube tutorials.
